item.title: Signature Aggregation Update
item.description: The status of the Half-Agg BIP? TODOs but also no use cases upcoming so adding it to the BIP repo doesn’t seem useful BIP Half-agg TODOs for BIP Consider setting z_0 = 1 Reconsider maximum number of signatures Add failing verification test vectors that exercise edge cases. Add signing test vectors (passing and failing, including edge cases) Test latest version of hacspec (run through checker) Half-agg BIP has a max number of signatures (2^16), making testing easy
